CESLA_TECH_LEAD: Cesla — Tech Lead / Full Stack Developer
CESLA_TECH_LEAD_DESC: Led critical products ensuring stability, security, and controlled evolution. Coordinated technical teams, implemented CI/CD pipelines, managed incident analysis, and standardized processes to improve efficiency and quality.
CESLA_FULLSTACK_DESC: Developed and maintained web and mobile applications in critical production environments. Added innovative features, optimized performance, and ensured code quality through best practices and technical reviews.
APEX_FRONTEND_DESC: Designed and maintained front-end interfaces for a customer service bot, ensuring usability, responsive design, and cross-platform compatibility.
FRONTEND: Frontend: Angular (v15+), React, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS
CLOUD: Cloud & DevOps: Azure (Pipelines, Release, Blob Storage, App Services), CI/CD, Cloudflare
TOOLS: Tools: Git, GitHub, Firebase, MySQL, Postman, Nginx, Portainer
DEPLOY_MOBILE: Mobile Deployment: Google Play Store, Apple App Store
